title: A36 Ad-poster cutout of Dan Brouthers (n162-esque) for sale
author: shammus

posts.post_title: A36 Ad-poster cutout of Dan Brouthers (n162-esque) for sale
posts.post_content:
Neat cutout off of an A36 Advertising poster.  19th century oddities are not easy to come by but this is one that's very affordable.  

This is in nice condition, very little wear aside from the nick above his ear.  No wrinkling.  Asking $100 delivered which is right at my cost on the card.  Thanks much...

Brian
